Review: Worst hospital ever. They take advantage of the situation to extract money from people. Receptionist has no common sense how to talk customers and patient. We did a blood test at that place for which they charged Rs. 1600, made us come and go for three days for this report.  But till the end we did not find any hard copy of it. Useless staff.

I was admitted in this hospital for delivery,I'm having B negative blood with low haemoglobin in start of 9th month,was on treatment in another hospital they scare me alot that you need to admit at institutional hospital and will require big amount of money etc.
Then I come to know about shatayu Hospital,Dipali ma'am and Amol sir gave assurance...and I delivered normally Thank you so much ma'am and sir..🙏🙏🙏🙏
